ingredients.content: 100 g green peppers, cut in pieces
130 - 150 g ripe tomatoes, cut in pieces
150 g potatoes, peeled, cut in pieces (4 cm)
800 g large white beans, tinned, rinsed (drained weight)
500 g fresh tuna, cut in pieces (4 cm)

preparations.content: Place oil, onions, peppers, tomatoes and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>10 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add bay leaf, salt, sugar, paprika and potatoes then sauté <b>1 min/120°C//speed <b>.

Add water and stock cube. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in beans. Insert Varoma tray and weigh in tuna. Cover Varoma and place into position then steam <b>20 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Remove Varoma and transfer tuna and beans to a deep serving dish. Pour over contents of mixing bowl then mix well with spatula. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.
